attributes.action: Hold a public referendum on repealing the Coronavirus bill, removing it from law
attributes.additional_details:
We the people are those most affected by the highly damaging Coronavirus bill and associated restrictions, on absolutely every level of our lives

We should be the ones to determine any further and future actions, as the payee of YOUR wages and fundamentally your employer, you have been unaffected whilst people have seen businesses, lives and families destroyed whilst being catapulted in a heartbeat into what could easily be North Korea!
This is not right, it is unjust, we do not consent!
attributes.background: Hold a referendum where the public get final say as to repeal the Coronavirus bill and any additional associated Covid restrictions

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
